title: AMA: Getting Started with OpenTelemetry and Sentry
description: Learn how to understand the performance of your OpenTelemetry instrumented applications with Sentry. This AMA covers how to turn raw telemetry data into actionable insights for tracing performance issues and surfacing errors.

title: Publishing JavaScript Libraries Made Easy
description: Publishing JavaScript libraries is complicated with different runtimes, TypeScript settings, bundler configurations, and the ESM vs CJS divide. This talk covers strategies for building robust libraries that are easy to use and stay working as JavaScript evolves.
